subject: College Athletics
Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament
lead_paragraph: An increasing number of players in the men’s N.C.A.A. basketball tournament wear No. 0 or No. 00.  Despite the negative connotation, players are embracing zero as a sign that they have something to prove.
